item.title: Google: Gemini 2.5 Pro
item.description:
Provider: Google Model ID: gemini-2.5-pro Model: Gemini 2.5 Pro Shutdown Date: 2025-06-26
Releasedgemini-2.5-pro, the stable version of our most powerful model, now with adaptive thinking. item.title: Google: Gemini 1.5 Flash
item.description:
Provider: Google Model ID: gemini-1.5-flash Model: Gemini 1.5 Flash Announcement Date: 2025-05-27
The last available tuning model, Gemini 1.5 Flash 001, has been shutdown. Tuning is no longer supported on any models. SeeFine tuning with the Gemini API.

item.title: Google Vertex: Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK
item.description:
Provider: Google Vertex Model ID: Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK Model: Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK Shutdown Date: 2026-06-24
Starting on June 24, 2025, the Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK is deprecated. The Generative AI module will be removed on June 24, 2026. For information about migrating to the Google Gen AI SDK, seeVertex AI SDK migration guide.

item.title: Google Vertex: Imagen 4 Preview models
item.description:
Provider: Google Vertex Model ID: Imagen 4 Preview models Model: Imagen 4 Preview models Shutdown Date: 2025-11-30
The following Imagen 4 Preview models are retiring on November 30, 2025 :imagen-4.0-generate-preview-06-06,imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-preview-06-06, andimagen-4.0-fast-generate-preview-06-06. To avoid service disruption, migrate all workflows that use Imagen 4 preview models before November 30, 2025 , to the following Imagen 4 Generally Available models:imagen-4.0-generate-001,imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-001,imagen-4.0-fast-generate-001.

item.title: Google Vertex: Imagen subject model and style model tuning
item.description:
Provider: Google Vertex Model ID: Imagen subject model and style model tuning Model: Imagen subject model and style model tuning Shutdown Date: 2025-12-31
Imagen subject model and style model tuning will be removed on December 31, 2025. We recommend that you useGemini 2.5 Flash Image, which supports most use cases that require fine-tuning. For more information, seeEdit images with Gemini.

item.description:
Provider: Cohere Model ID: command-r-03-2024, command-r, command-r-plus-04-2024, command-r-plus, command-light, command, summarize, classify, rerank Model: command-r-03-2024, command-r, command-r-plus-04-2024, command-r-plus, command-light, command, summarize, classify, rerank Shutdown Date: 2025-09-15
2025-09-15: Various older command models, a number of endpoints, all of fine-tuning. Effective September 15, 2025, the following deprecatations will roll out. Deprecated Models: command-r-03-2024(and the aliascommand-r)command-r-plus-04-2024(and the aliascommand-r-plus)command-lightcommandsummarize(Refer tothe migration guidefor alternatives). For command model replacements, we recommend you usecommand-r-08-2024,command-r-plus-08-2024, orcommand-a-03-2025(which is the strongest-performing model ...

item.title: Cohere: Command-R-03-2024 Fine-tuned Models
item.description:
Provider: Cohere Model ID: Command-R-03-2024-finetuned Model: Command-R-03-2024 Fine-tuned Models Shutdown Date: 2025-03-08
2025-03-08: Command-R-03-2024 Fine-tuned Models On March 08, 2025, we will sunset all models fine-tuned with Command-R-03-2024. As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance our services, we are making the following changes to our fine-tuning capabilities: Deprecating fine-tuning with the older Command-R-03-2024 modelAll fine-tunes are now powered by the Command-R-08-2024 model. Models fine-tuned with Command-R-03-2024 will continue to be supported until March 08, 2025. After this date, all requests...

item.title: Cohere: Classify Default Embed Models
item.description:
Provider: Cohere Model ID: classify-default-embed Model: Classify Default Embed Models Shutdown Date: 2025-01-31
2025-01-31: Default Classify endpoint After January 31st, 2025, usage of Classify endpoint via the default Embed models will be deprecated. However, you can still use the Classify endpoint with a fine-tuned Embed model. By leveraging fine-tuning, you can achieve even better performance and accuracy in your classification tasks. Read the documentation onClassify fine-tuningfor more information.

item.description:
